content: there she blows this bulky weight watch cap works up in a breeze to keep you cozy no matter the weather make it in a superwash for a buttery soft hat or an untreated wool for extra warmth-- this hat is a 1 skein project for most 100g bulky yarns this pattern is one-size-fits-all for most adult heads it is very stretchy and is suitable for adventurous beginners techniques -long tail cast on optional -centered decreases -ribbing -knitting in the round note an updated version has been made available as of nov 16 2019 to amend some errors and make some techniques more clear please make sure you have the version 2 document in your library
